contentList.content: Forged from polished silver and etched with icy runes, this ring is painfully cold to the touch, granting the wearer the massive, chilling strength of a frost giant.
Your melee weapon and unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].
After making a weapon or unarmed attack, you can cast a spell as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
Every turn while in combat, you generate [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>.
When you deal Cold damage, you inflict [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WET">Wet</LSTag> on the target.
Bolster your allies against the dangers that lie ahead.

Hit point maximum increased by [1].

When you roll a 1 on an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

You can see in the dark up to [2].
When you cast a damaging spell, add your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>" to the damage it deals.
